attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
U AV TWULEE SHOWN UR CULUS.
How many other families have you upset with your ill researched letters and poor spelling ?
You are an un elected leader and if this were to happen in any other country of the world you would be the first to complain or send the troops in. 
ITS TIME TO GO TO THE POLLS GOORDUN

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
